amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of Science and Technology Policy account by $1 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the OSTP account by $1,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A043) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A043) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
